#observer-title: Observer Pattern implementation in a fake supermarket stock control
#observer-p1: Adhering to the GOF pattern guidelines, this project exemplifies an Observer-Listener dynamic model within the context of a supermarket system. It represents real-time updates of product values across various listeners, such as a server for barcode scanner devices and cashiers that listen for a central server observer change on the existing products. This project made use of Java Swing for representing product cadastration and listners screens.
